commitMessage:
@@@KAFKA-8770: KIP-557: Drop idempotent KTable source updates (#8254)

Drops idempotent updates from KTable source operators.
Specifically.  drop updates in which the value is unchanged. 
and the timestamp is the same or larger.

Implements: KIP-557
Reviewers: Bruno Cadonna <bruno@confluent.io>.  John Roesler <vvcephei@apache.org>

@@@KAFKA-10165: Remove Percentiles from e2e metrics (#8882)

* Remove problematic Percentiles measurements until the implementation is fixed
* Fix leaking e2e metrics when task is closed
* Fix leaking metrics when tasks are recycled

Reviewers: A. Sophie Blee-Goldman <sophie@confluent.io>

@@@KAFKA-12924 Replace EasyMock and PowerMock with Mockito in streams metrics tests (#10850)

Reviewers: John Roesler <vvcephei@apache.org>.  Ismael Juma <ijuma@apache.org>
